"Electric Toothbrush Timer App" - Develop an app that reminds users to brush their teeth for the recommended two minutes and provides a fun and engaging experience to make brushing more enjoyable.

"Smart Electric Toothbrush" - Create an electric toothbrush that uses sensors to track the user's brushing habits and provide personalized feedback and recommendations for improving their oral health.
"Electric Toothbrush with Built-In UV Light" - Develop an electric toothbrush that includes a built-in UV light to help users detect and remove stains from their teeth and gums.
"Electric Toothbrush with Music" - Create an electric toothbrush that plays music while the user brushes, making the experience more enjoyable and helping them brush for the full two minutes.

"Electric Toothbrush with AI Assistant" - Develop an electric toothbrush that includes an AI assistant that can answer questions, provide product recommendations, and even schedule appointments with dentists.
